Articles.Content:
Before you go saying "Oh, PF is an old mod there are problems", I have experienced no game-breaking bugs (so far) and it is stable enough for me to use.

Anyways...

I'm having trouble installing the clouds for the Urania mod.

I put the textures in this directory: (KSP Directory)/GameData/BoulderCo/Clouds

That's the directory they tell me to put it in, but it doesn't seem to be working.

That is all.

Another misc problem:

Whenever I put down a modifiable HX part, it does this:

And it gives me this in the log, it copies it a lot.

(Filename: Line: 1783)

The referenced script on this Behaviour is missing!

and also this:

(Filename: Line: 1633)

The referenced script on this Behaviour is missing!
I've seen this before - 'tis in the B9 thread somewhere.

I've seen this before - 'tis in the B9 thread somewhere.

So do you know what it is or what it's caused by?

Yet another problem!

When I launch a craft, it doesn't show the kerbals inside or the portraits.

So do you know what it is or what it's caused by?

Not off the top of my head, no. I'm not doing your searching for you either

Problems of this kind are most often:

Mods not correctly installed (both the B9 texture glitch & the missing IVAs have been caused by this before)

Mod dependencies not installed correctly.

Incompatible or outdated mods.

Missing files.

Permissions issues on your KSP directory.

From the list of issues you're having, I'd say there's something screwed up with your install, specifically your install of B9 and its dependencies.

Check your gamedata folder structure.

Without a list of mods and a logfile all anyone can do is guess.
